about.title: About Our Center
about.subtitle: Discover our journey, philosophy, and commitment to authentic Ayurvedic healing.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2005 by Dr. Rajitha Perera, our center began with a vision to preserve and promote the authentic practice of Ayurveda in Sri Lanka. With a deep respect for traditional knowledge and a commitment to integrating modern understanding, we have grown to become one of the most trusted Ayurvedic centers in the country.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we have helped thousands of patients find relief from various health conditions through our holistic approach to wellness. Our success is built on our unwavering dedication to authenticity, quality, and personalized care.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: We believe in the timeless wisdom of Ayurveda and its power to heal, restore, and maintain health.

holistic.title: Holistic Approach
holistic.description: We treat the whole person—body, mind, and spirit—not just isolated symptoms. Our approach addresses the root causes of illness to promote complete healing and prevent recurrence.

authentic.title: Authentic Practices
authentic.description: We adhere to traditional Ayurvedic principles and practices, using authentic herbs, oils, and techniques passed down through generations of practitioners.

personalized.title: Personalized Care
personalized.description: We recognize that each person is unique, with their own constitution and health needs. Our treatments are carefully tailored to address individual requirements.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet our experienced practitioners dedicated to your health and wellbeing.

members.name: Dr. Rajitha Perera
members.bio: With over 30 years of experience in Ayurvedic medicine, Dr. Perera specializes in treating chronic conditions and has received numerous awards for his contributions to traditional medicine.

members.name: Dr. Amali Silva
members.bio: Dr. Silva specializes in women's health and skin conditions. Her gentle approach and deep knowledge of herbal remedies have helped countless patients achieve optimal health.

members.name: Dr. Nimal Jayawardena
members.bio: Dr. Jayawardena has dedicated his career to treating arthritis, back pain, and other musculoskeletal conditions using traditional Ayurvedic methods combined with modern rehabilitation techniques.

facility.title: Our Facility
facility.paragraph1: Our center is designed to provide a serene, healing environment where traditional practices meet modern comfort. Set in a tranquil location, our facility features private treatment rooms, consultation spaces, a herbal dispensary, and relaxation areas.
facility.paragraph2: We maintain the highest standards of cleanliness and hygiene while creating a warm, welcoming atmosphere that supports the healing process. Our center is equipped with both traditional Ayurvedic treatment equipment and modern amenities to ensure your comfort and care.
